Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people using a device to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound to send or receive messages.
The student can use labels to describe parts of the device and how they help in communication.
The student can include details showing that people depend on technology to communicate over distances.
The student can show how the device provides a solution to the problem of communicating over a distance.
